creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: choker-style gold necklace; woven strap with buckle in back; buckle and strap loop have small flowers attached to outer faces (two types of flowers, alternating every other one); three charms attached at front: each has a turquoise bead raised above a circle of gold and pearl
inscription: back of buckle, raised/attached Hebrew letters: פאי
title: Jewish wedding necklace
